summary: A psychiatrist attempts to uncover a troubled stable boy's disturbing obsession with horses.
cast: Richard Burton|Peter Firth|Colin Blakely|Joan Plowright|Harry Andrews|Eileen Atkins|Jenny Agutter|Kate Reid|John Wyman|Elva Mai Hoover|Ken James|Patrick Brymer|Sufi Bukhari|David Gardner|James Hurdle|Frazier Mohawk|Mark Parr|Karen Pearson|Sheldon Rybowski|Anita Van Hezewyck|Brook Williams
title: Equus
